name: Chinese Checkers Master
summary:
Chinese Checkers is a traditional board game, some people call it "Chinese chequers" or "Hop Ching Checker Game". This game named Chinese Checkers Master, because we have develop a powerful and intelligent AI player. You can play with it or other friends.
This game is very flexible, you can config 0 to 6 human players to play the game.
Why 0? You can set AI players only, it will demo to you how to play the game!
